title: 32. "Such a Huge Ego" Top 10 Signs You're Involved With a Narcissist
itunes:title: 32. "Such a Huge Ego" Top 10 Signs You're Involved With a Narcissist
description:
In this episode, we get real & raw about the narcissists in our lives. I chat about what signs narcissists exhibit, what narcissism looks like in our families and relationships, and the relationship between narcissistic abuse and low self-esteem and low sense of self-worth in its victims.

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
